channel.title: Okta Terraform Provider :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta Terraform Provider Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 71 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Automate org management with Terraform: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-landing-page/main/ Why is this here?: Based on Oktane GroupIt data, most external customers placed Terraform under Automate

item.title: Terraform basics
item.description: Terraform basics Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 73 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Terraform overview: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-overview/main/ Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.
